name: Appeal to Athena
text: Give to the Hercules player. When counting [[Gift]] cards you control, you are considered to control none. Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Hercules or spend [mental] [mental] → remove this obligation from the game.

name: Ares
text: Retaliate 1. [star] Forced Response: After Ares schemes, deal yourself 1 facedown encounter card. (Hercules's nemesis minion.)

name: Lernean Hydra
text: Forced Response: After a character you control attacks and damages Lernean Hydra, choose: • Spend a [physical] resource. • Lernean Hydra heals 2 damage.

flavor: Hercules has twice thwarted attempts to overthrow Olympus orchestrated by his uncle Pluto and half-brother Ares.
name: Olympic Feud
text: When Revealed: Place 1 additional threat here for each [[Olympus]] card in play.

flavor: From kukri to Shi'ar sniper rifles, Ares wields every weapon with equal malice toward all.
name: Ares's Axe
text: Attach to Ares. Otherwise, attach to the villain. [star] Forced Response: After attached enemy attacks, if no friendly character took damage from this attack, discard this card.

name: God of War
text: Each minion attacks the player it is engaged with (even if that player is in alter-ego form). If no minion activates this way, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a minion is discarded and reveal that minion.

name: All Versus All
text: Hinder 2[per_hero]. Forced Response: After a character is defeated, place 2 threat on this scheme. When Defeated: Set All Versus All aside.

flavor: "Those who once adored you have turned on you."
name: Hecate
text: When Revealed/Defeated: Find the All Versus All side scheme and reveal it. [star] Forced Response: After Hecate activates, place 2 threat on the All Versus All side scheme.

flavor: "The penalty of death shall be meted out by Kyknos, the son of Ares."
name: Kyknos
text: Retaliate 1. Toughness. Victory 0. [star] Forced Response: After Kyknos activates, place 2 threat on the All Versus All side scheme. Otherwise, place 1 threat on the main scheme.

name: Bewitched Officer
text:
Retaliate 1.
[star] Bewitched Officer's attacks gain piercing and ranged.

flavor: Nowhere is safe under the wargospel of All Versus All.
name: Roving Mobs
text: Victory 0. When Defeated: Find the All Versus All side scheme and reveal it.
